text: Ratchet & Clank is a 3D computer-animated science fiction action comedy movie. It was directed by Jericca Cleland and Kevin Munroe. The movie is based on the video game series of the same name. The movie was originally scheduled to be released in 2015. The movie was released on April 29, 2016. The movie was produced at Rainmaker Entertainment's Vancouver studio in Canada. It was executive produced by Michael Hefferon, the President of Rainmaker Entertainment. At the 2014 Electronic Entertainment Expo on June 9, 2014, the first trailer for the movie was revealed during Sony's press conference. == Voice cast == * James Arnold Taylor as Ratchet * David Kaye as Clank * Jim Ward as Captain Qwark * Paul Giamatti as Drek * Andrew Cownden as Zed *John Goodman as Grimroth *Bella Thorne as Cora *Rosario Dawson as Elaris *Sylvester Stallone as Lt. Victor Von Ion *Armin Shimerman as Doctor Nefarious ==References== == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2016 movies Category:American movies Category:American animated movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Canadian movies Category:Canadian animated movies Category:Canadian family movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on video games Category:Ratchet & Clank
title: Ratchet & Clank (movie)
